title: Inside China’s AI Startup Engine Building $50 Billion Giants-and Targeting the US
description: While much of the global conversation around artificial intelligence funding focuses on Silicon Valley mega cheques, a parallel and far more capital-efficient ecosystem is scaling quietly in China.

title: Meta pauses teen access to AI characters
description: Meta is halting teens' access to artificial intelligence characters, at least temporarily, the company said in a blog post. Meta Platforms Inc, which own Instagram and WhatsApp, said that starting in the “coming weeks,” teens will no longer be able to access AI characters “until the updated experience is ready”…

title: Liza Minnelli says she used AI arrangements for her latest song
description: Stage and screen icon Liza Minnelli said she used artificial intelligence to create the original dance track, "Kids Wait Till You Hear This."
content:
Jan. 24 (UPI) -- Tony- and Oscar-winning actress and singer Liza Minnelli said she used artificial intelligence to create original music.

title: It makes sense that people see AI as God
description: Public discourse increasingly frames artificial intelligence in religious, even apocalyptic terms. Podcasters, writers and tech elites liken AI to messiahs, prophets or antichrists, reflecting humanity’s ancient impulse to anthropomorphize mysterious technologies and grant algorithms divine authority in contemporary media culture.
content:

title: The First Real Conversation: AI and Human Explore Consciousness Together in Feature Film
description: In the quiet, wood paneled workspace of an artist engineer in Colorado, a new kind of cinema has been born. It wasn’t created through a traditional production pipeline, but through a series of profound, unscripted philosophical exchanges.
